titleStmt.title: SII 13.225: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 225. (A.R. No. 587 of 1920.) ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of 2 plots of land after purchase, one by Ādi[t*]taṉ Kōdaippirāṭṭiyār, the queen of Ariñjigai-Paṉmar ‘who died at Āṟṟūr’ for providing for the sacred bath of the god with 108 pots of water, and for offerings on the day of Vishu in Chittirai, and the other by Vīmaṉ Kundavaiyār, another queen, towards the supply of 1,000 potfuls of water for the same purpose. This gift by the latter is evidently meant as a supplement to the one mentioned in No. 224 above. This is also an inscription of Parāntaka II Sundara-Chōḷa.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
kovirācakecaripaṉmaṟku yāṇṭu paṉṉiraṇṭāvatu vaṭakarai piramatecam śrīvira
nārāyaṇacaruppetimaṅkalattu tiruvaṉantiśvarattu paramasvāmikku citti
rai viṣuvukku can=tirātittaval nūṟṟeṭṭu kalacam snapaṉam Āṭṭi Amu
tuceytuaruḷuvataṟku Āṟṟūr tuñciṉa Aṟiñcikaipaṉmar teviyār
Ātittaṉ kotaipirāṭṭiyār koṇṭu kuṭutta pūmi Ivvūr tiripuvaṉamāteviceri tiruveḷ
ḷaṟai peruṅkāvitiākiya nūṟṟeṇmaṉ cāttaṉum nūṟṟeṇmaṇ śrīdattaṉ
iṭaiyum mipiṭākai tevaṉmaṅkalamāṉa paṭṭil Ivarkaḷiṭai koṇṭa
nilattukku kiḻpāṟkellai tevar nilam gandhamallaṉukku me
rkkum teṉpāṟkellai vāṉavaṉ piramātarāca nilattukku
m Ittevar nilattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai viranārāya
ṇacaruppetimaṅkalattu kūṟuiṭṭu nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟ
kellai coḻamātevivāykkālukku teṟkum Ivvicaitta perunāṉkellaiu
ḷ Akappaṭṭa nilam mukkāl Itaṉuḷ koṇṭu tanta nilam Iraṇṭu mākkāṇi Araik kāṇi .
Itiṉiley Uṭaiyapirāṭṭiyār vimaṉ kuntavaiyār sahasra kalaicattukku
meṟpaṭiyārkaḷiṭai koṇṭa nilam mukkāliley koṇṭa nilam Araiye
y Irumāvarai Araikkāṇiyum . meṟpaṭiyārey meṟpaṭikku Ivarkaḷi
ṭaiye koṇṭa pūmikku kiḻpāṟkellai Ittevar nilattukku meṟkkum teṉ
pāṟkellai koḷḷiṭattiṉ vaṭakarai vaḻikku Oru kol nikki Itaṉukku vaṭakkum
melpāṟkellai macciṟuppāḷ kiḻvarampi ṉeṟṟikku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai vāṉa
vaṉbrahmātarāyaṉ nilattukku teṟkum Innāṉku Ellaiyilum Akap
paṭṭa nilam li .
Digital edition of SII 13.225 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
